attributes.action: To cancel all A Level and GCSEs exams within Wales for the summer of 2022?
attributes.additional_details: I would like the Government and Parliament to cancel exams within Wales for the summer of 2022 due to the disruptions and emotional distress pupils have had within schools because of the Covid 19 pandemic.
attributes.background: The Government should cancel GCSEs and A Levels in the summer of 2022 due to the disruption of the Covid 19 Pandemic.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Welsh Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Welsh Parliament has its own Petitions Committee.

If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Parliament, you can find out more here:
https://petitions.senedd.wales/

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Cancel GCSE and A-Level Exams for Summer 2022 due to lack of proper education: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597282
